snippet: Sanford I. Weill and his wife, Joan, do not fund a lot of different causes, but they have spent about $1 billion on a few of them.
abstract: Former financier Sanford I Weill and his wife Joan do not fund a lot of different causes, but instead get deeply involved in just a few of them; couple has spent about $1 billion funding just several institutions, including Carnegie Hall, Weill Cornell Medical College and National Academy Foundation.
lead_paragraph: Sanford I. Weill and his wife, Joan, do not fund a lot of different causes, but they have spent about $1 billion on a few of them.

headline.main: A Few Good Causes, but Plenty of Time to Spend on Them
headline.print_headline: A Few Good Causes, But Plenty of Time To Spend on Them

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Green Music Center at Sonoma State University
